sentences: Järgmisel aastal sünnib veel üks laps.
Kui laps sünnib, on see väga rõõmusündmus.
context: The word 'sünnib' is the 3rd person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'sünnima', which means 'to be born'. It describes the action of something or someone coming into existence. In this case, it specifically refers to a child being born as seen in the dictionary definition where 'laps' (child) is mentioned in relation to birth ('sündimisest').
